common_0215_rival_04:
Didja battle some Trainers on the hill? Bet your
Pokémon [VAR NUMBRNCH(00FD,0302)]isare getting stronger![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_05:
How about you show me how much you [VAR NUMBRNCH(00FD,0303)]twoall have
learned...in a battle?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_06a: All right! Nothing like having a friend around![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_06b:
If you’re not sure, all the more reason to give it
a shot! A nice battle will help us get to know\r
each other better, too![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Come on, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Let’s have
us a\r
fruitful\r
battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_08a:
Amazing! Look at you, taking on a [VAR COLOR(0006)]Terastallized[VAR COLOR(0000)]
opponent and winning, no problem![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_12:
Come to think of it, you can’t Terastallize your
Pokémon yet, huh?\c
Don’t worry—I’ll get you taken care of![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_13:
You’re so good with Pokémon battles, I forget
how new you are to this stuff sometimes![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_08b:
I guess the hill wore you out a bit, huh? Still,
even if I did take the win this time, your moves\r
weren’t bad. Not bad at all![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_14:
Anyway, it was fun to battle you! Here, have
some Revives as thanks![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_09:
Now, Mesagoza’s waiting just past this gate!
At last, the city where our school is![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0215_rival_10:
There’s a ton of hills and stairs and stuff in the
city, so I’m gonna take a quick breather and then\r
catch up with you soon![VAR 0114(0004)]
